title: Redesign of www.michaelbrowers.com Launched
content:
Michael Browers announced the launch of a redesign of his website, [http://www.michaelbrowers.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012181123/http:/www.michaelbrowers.com/). The redesign features his retail fonts, custom fonts and logo & lettering services. Additionally, the website includes a "Fonts in Use" section.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012181123im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MB_Web_Screenshot_5553.jpg)
author: michaelbrowers
